vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.30; also called Hurai at 1Ch.11.32;
Also named: chu.ray (חוּרַי "Hurai" H2360)
§ Hiddai = "for the rejoicing of Jehovah"
one of the 37 mighty warriors of David's guard
vocabInfos._es_Definition: guerrero; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希太 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "為耶和華的喜樂"
大衛的卅七名英勇護衛之一 (撒下 23:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希太 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "为耶和华的喜乐"
大卫的卅七名英勇护卫之一 (撒下 23:30)
